data.text:
Formerly the Newspaper Association of America

FIGHTING FOR THE PUBLISHERS OF GREAT JOURNALISM.

We are the leading voice for the news and magazine media industries, fighting for the future of publishing. Our members represent today’s most trusted and compelling news and media brands whose job it is to keep the world informed. Our advocacy, proprietary research and events leverage the brightest minds and unite our diverse members under a shared purpose. Together, we’re creating the strategies and business models that will enable original, quality journalism to grow and thrive.

LATEST ARTICLES

Statement: California Journalism Preservation Act Passes Through Senate Appropriations Committee

The News/Media Alliance applauds California Senators for their continued support and steadfast commitment to passing the California Journalism Preservation Act ... Read More

DOJ Rules Against Google in Landmark Lawsuit, Says Google Violated Antitrust Laws

On August 5, the Department of Justice (DOJ) ruled against Google in an historic lawsuit, finding that Google violated antitrust ... Read More

Recording Now Available! Member Webinar: Copyright Registration Tutorial: Part 2 of 2

The Copyright Office just made registration of publisher website content easier than ever by adopting its proposed Rule on Group ... Read More

PUBLIC POLICY

Get the latest updates on our advocacy work around top issues affecting today’s news and magazine media, including artificial intelligence (AI); journalist protection and free press issues; postal rates; and state and federal public policies that allow news and magazine media to deliver trusted and valued content to readers and to generate jobs and growth for the national and local economies.

In particular, read about our efforts to call attention to platform dominance and the need for appropriate monetization by the platforms. Visit the JCPA Resource Center to learn more about the Journalism Competition & Preservation Act, which would allow news publishers to protect local news through collectively negotiating with the tech platforms for better business terms.

You can also learn more about our advocacy on artificial intelligence issues on multiple fronts, including our White Paper documenting the pervasive and unauthorized use of media content to fuel generative AI systems, as well as our advocacy around copyright infringement considerations. The Alliance has also driven the development of AI Principles and advances publishers’ interests in leading public and policymaker forums.

LATEST ARTICLES
